sqlMap.select: SELECT i.BLOG_ID, i.BLOG_TITLE, i.BLOG_CONTENT, i.SUB_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(i.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_TIME, i.PIC_LINK, t.TYPE_NAME, i.SHARE_COUNT, i.READE_COUNT FROM T_BLOG_DETAIL_INFO i LEFT JOIN T_BLOG_TYPE t ON i.BLOG_TYPE = t.TYPE_ID ORDER BY i.CREATE_TIME

SELECT i.BLOG_ID, i.BLOG_TITLE, i.BLOG_CONTENT, i.SUB_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(i.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_TIME, i.PIC_LINK, t.TYPE_NAME, i.SHARE_COUNT, i.READE_COUNT FROM T_BLOG_DETAIL_INFO i LEFT JOIN T_BLOG_TYPE t ON i.BLOG_TYPE = t.TYPE_ID WHERE i.BLOG_ID = #blogId#
